TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class AccessibilityEvent : Android.Views.Accessibility.AccessibilityRecord, Android.OS.IParcelable, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AccessibilityEvent extends Android.Views.Accessibility.AccessibilityRecord implements class Android.OS.IParcelable, class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class System.IDisposable
type AccessibilityEvent = class inherit AccessibilityRecord interface IParcelable interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable

Docs.summary: This class represents accessibility events that are sent by the system when something notable happens in the user interface.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Change type for #TYPE_WINDOW_STATE_CHANGED event: The node's pane title changed.

Gets the bit mask of change types signaled by a #TYPE_WINDOW_CONTENT_CHANGED event or #TYPE_WINDOW_STATE_CHANGED. -or- Sets the bit mask of node tree changes signaled by an #TYPE_WINDOW_CONTENT_CHANGED#TYPE_WINDOW_CONTENT_CHANGED event.
Docs.value:
The bit mask of change types. One or more of:
  • #CONTENT_CHANGE_TYPE_CONTENT_DESCRIPTION
  • #CONTENT_CHANGE_TYPE_STATE_DESCRIPTION
  • #CONTENT_CHANGE_TYPE_SUBTREE
  • #CONTENT_CHANGE_TYPE_TEXT
  • #CONTENT_CHANGE_TYPE_PANE_TITLE
  • #CONTENT_CHANGE_TYPE_UNDEFINED
  • #CONTENT_CHANGE_TYPE_PANE_APPEARED
  • #CONTENT_CHANGE_TYPE_PANE_DISAPPEARED

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
